Core App#

Provides fundamental system functionality including user management and system utilities.

Purpose#

Base functionality required by all other applications:

  • Custom user model with email-based authentication

  • Management commands for system operations

  • Documentation generation utilities

Data Model & API#

.. py:attribute:: User.groups :no-index: :module: apps.core.models

  Accessor to the related objects manager on the forward and reverse sides of
  a many-to-many relation.

  In the example::

      class Pizza(Model):
          toppings = ManyToManyField(Topping, related_name='pizzas')

  ``Pizza.toppings`` and ``Topping.pizzas`` are ``ManyToManyDescriptor``
  instances.

  Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager
  class built by ``create_forward_many_to_many_manager()`` defined below.

.. py:attribute:: User.logentry_set :no-index: :module: apps.core.models

  Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a
  many-to-one relation.

  In the example::

      class Child(Model):
          parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

  ``Parent.children`` is a ``ReverseManyToOneDescriptor`` instance.

  Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager
  class built by ``create_forward_many_to_many_manager()`` defined below.

.. py:module:: apps.core.management.commands.docs_export :no-index:

Django management command to export documentation from code. Generates Mermaid diagrams, API documentation, and schemas.

.. py:class:: Command(stdout=None, stderr=None, no_color=False, force_color=False) :no-index: :module: apps.core.management.commands.docs_export

Bases: :py:class:~django.core.management.base.BaseCommand

.. py:method:: Command.add_arguments(parser) :no-index: :module: apps.core.management.commands.docs_export

  Entry point for subclassed commands to add custom arguments.

.. py:method:: Command.generate_api_docs(output_dir: ~pathlib.Path) :no-index: :module: apps.core.management.commands.docs_export

  Generate API documentation from storage interfaces and services

.. py:method:: Command.generate_erd(output_dir: ~pathlib.Path) :no-index: :module: apps.core.management.commands.docs_export

  Generate Entity Relationship Diagram using Mermaid

.. py:method:: Command.generate_placeholders(output_dir: ~pathlib.Path) :no-index: :module: apps.core.management.commands.docs_export

  Generate placeholder content for hybrid page includes

.. py:method:: Command.generate_schemas(output_dir: ~pathlib.Path) :no-index: :module: apps.core.management.commands.docs_export

  Generate JSON schemas for models and interfaces

.. py:method:: Command.handle(*args, **options) :no-index: :module: apps.core.management.commands.docs_export

  The actual logic of the command. Subclasses must implement
  this method.

.. py:attribute:: Command.help :no-index: :module: apps.core.management.commands.docs_export :value: ‘Export documentation from Django models and code’

User Model#

The core app defines a custom User model with email-based authentication:

from apps.core.models import User

# Email is the username field
user = User.objects.create_user(
    username='john',
    email='john@example.com', 
    password='secure_password'
)

# Authentication uses email
from django.contrib.auth import authenticate
user = authenticate(email='john@example.com', password='secure_password')

User Fields#

  • email - Primary authentication field (unique)

  • bio - Optional user biography

  • date_of_birth - Optional birth date

  • phone_number - Optional phone number

  • is_profile_complete - Profile completion flag

  • created_at - Account creation timestamp

  • updated_at - Last modification timestamp

Management Commands#

docs_export#

Exports documentation from Django models and code structure:

python manage.py docs_export --out docs/_generated --erd --api --schemas

Options:

  • --erd - Generate Entity Relationship Diagram from models

  • --api - Generate API documentation from interfaces

  • --schemas - Export JSON schemas for models

Generated Output:

  • erd.mmd - Mermaid ERD diagram

  • storage_api.md - API documentation with architecture diagrams

  • schemas.json - JSON schemas for all models

Configuration#

# Custom user model
AUTH_USER_MODEL = 'core.User'

# Authentication backend for email login
AUTHENTICATION_BACKENDS = [
    'django.contrib.auth.backends.ModelBackend',
]
